Dialogue: Thank god, someone else! What message were you given?
The third stop... but the train hasn't stopped since I woke up here. Still, this gives me hope.
Yes, I heard a voice too. It told me 'the first person you look at will die.' I've never heard anything in my head like that before.
Don't worry, I'm keeping my eyes shut.
You believe that lady about sitting? If she's right we're going to have to make that glasses guy take a seat.
If you get him talking I'll look towards his voice and we can end this with force.
Either nothing will happen or something will, then we'd have died anyway because he won't sit!
I'm not sure if we can trust these messages we've heard, but there's nothing else to go off of.
My memory is a hazy mess before waking up here, and I've overheard the others talking, no one is sure what's happening.
If you talk to the guy with glasses and get him to say something, I'll look his way to see what happens.
If the voice is telling the truth, I don't think it'll end well for us if he's standing.
I'll wait for the third stop in hopes your message will lead us somewhere.
HOLY SHIT. FUCK, he's gone. I can't believe it, I just have to not think about it right now.
Now we just have to wait for the right stop. This proves that the messages are true!
I'm not sure what'll happen if I look at someone again, just tell me when it's the third stop and I'll follow you!
Whatever's happening, we have to get out of here.
I'll follow you out when you go, don't worry about me.
